name: Earth Mother
uniques: [+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from every [Mine] <in [Bonus resource] tiles>
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from every [Mine] <in [Luxury resource] tiles>
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from every [Mine] <in [Strategic resource] tiles>

name: God of All Creation
uniques: [+2 Food, +2 Production, +2 Science, +2 Gold] from every [Palace]
[+2 Food, +2 Production, +2 Science, +2 Gold] from every [Palace] <starting from the [Classical era]>

name: God of Commerce
uniques: [+2 Gold, +2 Faith] from each trade route
May buy [God of Commerce - Capital] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [God of Commerce - Religious] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]

name: God of the Stars and Sky
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Food, +1 Faith] from every [Strategic resource] <in [Tundra] tiles>

[+1 Culture, +1 Food, +1 Faith] from every [Luxury resource] <in [Tundra] tiles>

name: God of War
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities]

name: God-King
uniques: May buy [God-King - Capital] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]
May buy [God-King - Religious] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]

[+1 Faith,+1 Gold,+1 Culture,+1 Science,+1 Happiness] per [5] population [in all cities] <after founding a religion>

name: Goddess of Beauty
uniques: May buy [Goddess of Beauty - Capital] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]

[+1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Science] from every [Luxury resource] <in [Jungle] tiles>

May buy [Goddess of Wisdom - Religious] buildings for [0] [Gold] [in all cities]

[+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Faith] from every [Luxury resource] <in [Desert] tiles>
